segments.text: This scene holds so much potential for disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a knot in my stomach watching it unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is still overflowing, water spreading everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That floor is going to be incredibly slippery soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Imagine the woman turning around and stepping into that puddle without warning.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She could easily lose her footing and fall heavily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the boy on the stool, that's another accident waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are splayed, it looks so wobbly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he falls from that height, he could really hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Not to mention smashing the cookies and the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water damage to the cabinets will be significant too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's frustrating to see so many risks being ignored.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to step in and turn off the faucet or steady the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is making me feel quite anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would notice and intervene.
segments.speaker: PAR
